content: this crochet pattern will instruct you to how to make a rag doll scarf inspired by sally from nightmare before christmas the pattern includes instructions how to make the scarf and add the details this is for pattern only not a finished product please give it a ♡ on here if you like it materials 5mm red heart super saver maroon black yellow light blue light purple and teal you can choose to change any color black puff paint optional for details yarn needle scissors the skills required to complete this pattern include basic crochet stitches crocheting in row changing colors sewing pieces together embroidery painting with puff paint optional this pattern is written in english and uses u s crochet terminology this pattern is 8 pages long and includes instructions and multiple pictures by me and my testers and you can always contact me if you have any further questions the pattern is in pdf form pattern has been tested by multiple testers the finished scarf comes out about 70 inches long and 7 1/2 wide when using recommended yarn and hooks size may vary depending on gauge size can be adjusted easily sally and nightmare before christmas are copyright of disney this is a inspired sally piece and will always be a free pattern **matching coffee cozy now available in my raverly store also free ** this is for pattern only not a finished product
